name: winzer
description: Dawn-based architecture for multisite Shopify builds.
author: CQL Corp

scripts.onesource:build: npm run onesource:ss-build && node scripts/deploy.js -s onesource
scripts.onesource:ss-build: cd ./searchspring/winzer && npm ci && npm run build-onesource
scripts.onesource:deploy: npm run onesource:build && cd ./deploy_onesource && theme deploy
scripts.onesource:deploy-staging: npm run onesource:build && cd ./deploy_onesource && theme deploy -e staging
scripts.onesource:deploy-production: npm run onesource:build && cd ./deploy_onesource && theme deploy -e production --allow-live
scripts.onesource:download: node scripts/download-pre.js -s onesource && cd ./download && theme download && cd .. && node scripts/download-post.js -s onesource
scripts.onesource:download-staging: node scripts/download-pre.js -s onesource && cd ./download && theme download -e staging && cd .. && node scripts/download-post.js -s onesource
scripts.onesource:download-production: node scripts/download-pre.js -s onesource && cd ./download && theme download -e production && cd .. && node scripts/download-post.js -s onesource
scripts.fastserv:build: npm run fastserv:ss-build && node scripts/deploy.js -s fastserv
scripts.fastserv:ss-build: cd ./searchspring/winzer && npm ci && npm run build-fastserv
scripts.fastserv:deploy: npm run fastserv:build && cd ./deploy_fastserv && theme deploy
scripts.fastserv:deploy-staging: npm run fastserv:build && cd ./deploy_fastserv && theme deploy -e staging
scripts.fastserv:deploy-production: npm run fastserv:build && cd ./deploy_fastserv && theme deploy -e production --allow-live
scripts.fastserv:download: node scripts/download-pre.js -s fastserv && cd ./download && theme download && cd .. && node scripts/download-post.js -s fastserv
scripts.fastserv:download-staging: node scripts/download-pre.js -s fastserv && cd ./download && theme download -e staging && cd .. && node scripts/download-post.js -s fastserv
scripts.fastserv:download-production: node scripts/download-pre.js -s fastserv && cd ./download && theme download -e production && cd .. && node scripts/download-post.js -s fastserv
scripts.corp:build: npm run corp:ss-build && node scripts/deploy.js -s corp
scripts.corp:ss-build: cd ./searchspring/winzer && npm ci && npm run build-corp
scripts.corp:deploy: npm run corp:build && cd ./deploy_corp && theme deploy
scripts.corp:deploy-staging: npm run corp:build && cd ./deploy_corp && theme deploy -e staging
scripts.corp:deploy-production: npm run corp:build && cd ./deploy_corp && theme deploy -e production --allow-live
scripts.corp:download: node scripts/download-pre.js -s corp && cd ./download && theme download && cd .. && node scripts/download-post.js -s corp
scripts.corp:download-staging: node scripts/download-pre.js -s corp && cd ./download && theme download -e staging && cd .. && node scripts/download-post.js -s corp
scripts.corp:download-production: node scripts/download-pre.js -s corp && cd ./download && theme download -e production && cd .. && node scripts/download-post.js -s corp
